original: @133b # // / rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @133b # // / rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ti la ka siddhi /
analyzed: ti la ka siddhi /
translated: Tilakasiddhi

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: thig le grub pa /
analyzed: thig le grub pa /
translated: The Drop of Attainment

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Ma침ju콑r캶, the great wisdom being.

original: gang blo dri ma'i rgyun 'dzag gab //
analyzed: gang blo dri ma'i rgyun 'dzag gab //
translated: The stream of stains in the mind is concealed.

original: nges par byed pa'i thig le rim //
analyzed: nges par byed pa'i thig le rim //
translated: The stages of the definitive drop

original: gang gis gang la de bstan na //
analyzed: gang gis gang la de bstan na //
translated: are taught by whom to whom,

original: bde ba chen po'i rgyun 'dzag 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rgyun 'dzag 'gyur //
translated: the stream of great bliss will flow.

original: mchog bzang bla ma'i zhabs pad la //
analyzed: mchog bzang bla ma'i zhabs pad la //
translated: Bowing to the lotus feet of the excellent guru,

original: dkon mchog gsum dang mtshungs btud de //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum dang mtshungs btud de //
translated: equal to the Three Jewels,

original: ye shes rdo rje 'chang bla ma //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje 'chang bla ma //
translated: the guru of wisdom Vajradhara,

original: gsang ba'i thigs pa bshad par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i thigs pa bshad par bya //
translated: the secret drop will be explained.

original: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: By the yoga of the deity's self,

original: sa bon cho 'phrul kun bsdus te //
analyzed: sa bon cho 'phrul kun bsdus te //
translated: the seed and all miracles are gathered,

original: de nyid la ni dmigs pa yis //
analyzed: de nyid la ni dmigs pa yis //
translated: and by observing that itself,

original: yi ge dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yi ge dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: the recollection of the syllable is perfected.

original: skad cig la ni rnam grangs brgyad //
analyzed: skad cig la ni rnam grangs brgyad //
translated: In an instant, the eight enumerations

original: go rims bzlas pa bstan pa dang // thig le chen por yang bsdus te //
analyzed: go rims bzlas pa bstan pa dang // thig le chen por yang bsdus te //
translated: are taught in sequence, and also gathered into the great drop.

original: reg bya'i dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: reg bya'i dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: The recollection of touch is perfected.

original: de nyid bcu drug gyur pa gang //
analyzed: de nyid bcu drug gyur pa gang //
translated: That itself is sixteenfold,

original: yi ge'i phreng bas bgrang byas te //
analyzed: yi ge'i phreng bas bgrang byas te //
translated: counted by the garland of syllables.

original: 'pho dang 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: 'pho dang 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: By the yoga of transference and entry,

original: rlung gi dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung gi dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: the mindfulness of wind will be perfected.

original: rnam shes ye shes mthong ba gang //
analyzed: rnam shes ye shes mthong ba gang //
translated: Consciousness and the sight of gnosis

original: yul min shes pa'i mtshan nyid las //
analyzed: yul min shes pa'i mtshan nyid las //
translated: are not objects, characterized by knowledge.

original: 'gro dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa //
analyzed: 'gro dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa //
translated: The non-observation of coming and going

original: thig le dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: thig le dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: is the perfected mindfulness of the bindu.

original: steng dang 'og la dmigs pa'i yid //
analyzed: steng dang 'og la dmigs pa'i yid //
translated: The mind that focuses on above and below

original: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
analyzed: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
translated: is the empty bindu of one hundred syllables.游댷The mind that is neither still nor moving,

original: yid gnas ldang 'jug med pa dang // stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
analyzed: yid gnas ldang 'jug med pa dang // stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
translated: the five syllables of great emptiness,

original: 'og gi gnas la dmigs nas kyang ;
analyzed: 'og gi gnas la dmigs nas kyang ;
translated: and also focusing on the lower abode

original: / thig le chen po yi ge med //
analyzed: / thig le chen po yi ge med //
translated: is the great bindu without syllables.

original: phyed cha lhag pa zla ba'i gnas //
analyzed: phyed cha lhag pa zla ba'i gnas //
translated: The remainder of the half-moon abode

original: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
translated: is the great mantra of the three families.

original: 'byung dang 'jug dang dran par bzlas //
analyzed: 'byung dang 'jug dang dran par bzlas //
translated: The mantra is recited as arising, entering, and mindfulness.

original: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
analyzed: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
translated: The mantra that arises from the mantra is without syllables.

original: gnas med gnas la gnas pa gang //
analyzed: gnas med gnas la gnas pa gang //
translated: The one who abides in the abode that is not an abode

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
translated: is to be realized by all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas @134a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas @134a * //
translated: Buddha

original: byang chub bla na med //
analyzed: byang chub bla na med //
translated: Enlightenment is unsurpassed.

original: sbyor ba rdzogs dang sbyor ba gcig pa dang // dran pas gnas dang longs spyod chen po dang // bsam mi khyab dang lnga yis thig le grub //
analyzed: sbyor ba rdzogs dang sbyor ba gcig pa dang // dran pas gnas dang longs spyod chen po dang // bsam mi khyab dang lnga yis thig le grub //
translated: The drop is accomplished by five: the completion of application, the single application, the abiding of mindfulness, the great enjoyment, and the inconceivable.

original: dam pa'i zhal gyi tshig gis 'ching ba grol //
analyzed: dam pa'i zhal gyi tshig gis 'ching ba grol //
translated: The fetters are released by the words of the sublime face.

original: ri khrod mgon po las rnyed pa'i //
analyzed: ri khrod mgon po las rnyed pa'i //
translated: The instructions obtained from the protector of the forest

original: man ngag gzhung gi dbu ma l'a //
analyzed: man ngag gzhung gi dbu ma l'a //
translated: In the Madhyamaka of the treatise

original: nang gi nang la 'jug pa'i rim //
analyzed: nang gi nang la 'jug pa'i rim //
translated: The stages of engaging the inner of the inner游댷May all attain the state of the Sugatas.

original: kun kyang bde gshegs gnas thob shog / thig le grub pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: kun kyang bde gshegs gnas thob shog / thig le grub pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The accomplishment of the drop composed by the Indian master 콐r캶 Advaya-vajra is complete.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o /
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o /
translated: The yog캶-bhik攷믓 Praj침캐-콑r캶-j침캐na-kirti made this self-translation.
